title: rat03gopoh
author: rat03gopoh
content: BLOCK apparently held online discussions with HRF[1], on the main topic of bitcoin. Looks like it will be an interesting discussion.QuoteIn this series, humanitarians, activists, and leaders share their stories of relying on bitcoin for critical financial access.Looking at the list of speakers, this event will probably be several sessions (first started today at 9am). Registration page for those who wanna join (and don't like any shortlinks  )[2].1. https://twitter.com/blocks/status/15889090834403532812. https://currency-of-freedom.xyz/Currency-of-Freedom/en
